item.description:
Please join us for our regular monthly meetup, potluck and discussion of permaculture design principles!

In this first of a series of discussions we will have an overview of the basic ethics and principles of permaculture design which will be followed up in ensuing months with a discussion of each element of design and how they can be applied to our homes, gardens, communities etc.

The loose agenda:
7:00- Meet and greet
7:15- Share a potluck meal and discussion of permaculture basics
8:45-Make individual statements on how each of us can incorporate the ethics and principles into our lives on any scale.
9:15-Wrap up

Please bring:
-A potluck dish to share
-Questions about and contributions to the discussion
-An interest in the topic and willingness to learn and share

A small contribution of $1 to help cover meetup and other costs will be appreciated.
item.name: August Potluck and Permaculture Principles
